website_summaries.verdict: The best budget set of BMX handlebars that are appropriate for at-home builds or as replacement bars.
pros: Includes enough width for good control during tricks
Narrow enough to easily spin the handlebars around without hitting anything else
Tube width is compatible with most stem clamps
cons: Will not stand up to professional levels of abuse

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bent my Sunday bars landing completely flat from 6' on concrete. Didn't want to spend 70$ for the Odyssey's I wanted and found these in a search for bmx bars. Was sceptical on the price cuz you get what you pay for but they are 4130 chromoly and have been holding up to my rough style of riding. From street, dirt to skateparks they have been great. They have the same sweep and rise as my Sundays but are 1/2" narrower; not even enough to throw off my flow.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Tafoya

customer_reviews.title: Looking to sit more upright?
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement for low rise mountain bike bars. Basically turns that bike into a hybrid - maybe with a new seat too. Our daughter was very happy after complaints of wrist pain with old bars.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size handlebars even on my xl bmx bike I'm building, but would fit perfectly even on a standard size bike, 100% recommend these handlebars and are perfect for barspins.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Murillo

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty for daily thrashing
customer_reviews.text: They're nice. The bar thickness makes them a bit heavy but that's why I bought them, for durability.
customer_reviews.author: Perjian

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: For those who want to ride more upright such as cruiser bikes, these work well. The cross bar is great for hanging a bag from. Heavy gauge steel, and thick coating of paint.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.P

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Used to replace the handle bars on a Phatmoto. Much better steel than originals. Now I can sit and ride and not be hunched over the handlebars. Kept having second thoughts about needing more than the 8.5 in rise but it is perfect height for 6 ft tall me.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: DB4L!
customer_reviews.text: These handle bars very well made, with a high gloss black finish for a reasonable price under $30.
customer_reviews.author: Yo

customer_reviews.title: Great Handlebars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Good all around. I replaced the straight bar handlebars on a mountain bike with these. Had to replace the shifter and brake cables because this bar is higher, but I love my "new" bike!
customer_reviews.author: MarkD60

customer_reviews.title: Very good handle bars for the Mongoose Beast!
customer_reviews.text: Just put these on my Beast and went for a ride. Makes a world of difference! They are very solid and a bit heavy. The paint is perfect and very glossy. The only thing they should have done to make these bars a bit better is to have grooves at the base that goes into the clamp. Make sure to tighten everything up! I recommend these bars. Great price for a solid set of handle bars!
customer_reviews.author: SatchmoDan

customer_reviews.title: Great handlebar, terrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: They feel sturdy and installed easily, but when they showed up, the box was torn open and the end of the bars had been dragged across the ground.
customer_reviews.author: LSU Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome handlebars! Put them on my Fat boy Bike to get more of a cruiser stance. Very well made, obviously they aren't the lightest handlebars being they are made of steel but that is expected.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Falkenhagen

customer_reviews.title: Great bars for the $
customer_reviews.text: These Diamondback "generic" Cr-Mo replacement bars have a sturdy feel, the welds look well done, and the gloss black finish looks very good. The cross-bar is actually bigger OD than the main bar and is ovalized at the ends for fit, which is kind of cool. The only down-side, which I already suspected based on the price (and all straight-gauge construction) is that the weight is NOT 1 lb, 12oz as stated in Amazon and other places on the web. These bars weigh 2 lb, 5oz. If you are counting every oz., you will likely have to pay a lot more to get lighter ones this size. To me, the sturdiness counts more and they are a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fox

customer_reviews.title: Nice bars needed shims
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit clamps make sure to measure and order shims. Bars are nice
customer_reviews.author: jarred

customer_reviews.title: Bmx Cruiser
customer_reviews.text: Love the weight and feel of these handlebars. They gave my bmx cruiser project the stance and feel I was going for.
customer_reviews.author: DF

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Upright Position
customer_reviews.text: These bars are a nice easy fix to get a more upright riding position. Just be aware of your original handlebar size (dia), these were 3mm thinner than my old bars so I had to get the appropriate spacer shims (22.2 to 25.4), not a big deal really. Most GOOD local bike shops will have shims, call first.
customer_reviews.author: Ziegmont

customer_reviews.title: I am all torso so I am much happier with the taller bars
customer_reviews.text: I installed these figuring the 8 inch rise would be enough but ended up getting the 10 inch rise. I am all torso so I am much happier with the taller bars. These bars were fine quality though.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Y.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Product and Service. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: JFC

customer_reviews.title: These 9" riser bars have enough room to mount shifters ...
customer_reviews.text: These 9" riser bars have enough room to mount shifters, brakes and mirrors, which many do not. -Nicely made. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Tag Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Look great on my old school build
customer_reviews.text: Look great on my old school build. Built well. A little heavy compared to other bars and cross bar is a bit narrow. Old padset does not fit cross bar well. Black Ops is a good alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Neal

customer_reviews.title: HIGH RISE BAR = COMFORTABLE CRUISING POSITION!
customer_reviews.text: I installed these bars on my Mongoose BRUTUS fat tire cruiser. Having the higher bars really allows a much more comfortable seating position. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you only care about the look
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, this beautiful bar weighs a TON! More than any other single peice other than the frame!
customer_reviews.author: Martina Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Great for MTB to cruiser conversion
customer_reviews.text: I used these to convert my Trek 4900 mountain bike to a comfortable multi-purpose cruiser/light trail bike. You also need some shims because of the different diameter. Look for Problem Solver shims here on Amazon. These bars work because the ends have a long enough straight section to mount the shifter, brake, and handgrip. Another set of bars I tried did not have a long enough straight section at the end. Keep that in mind for this type of conversion. The bars seem really strong and well made.
customer_reviews.author: J. P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looked sturdy. Good for price. Returned because I decided not to change my bars. Easy return.
customer_reviews.author: Ok, I guess I can review this if I have to.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great price
customer_reviews.text: Very light and just enough rise for what I needed with my BMX.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality And Finish
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality! Kind of heavy but so am I :)
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Nice bars
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my Mongoose Beast and so far seems to perform just fine.Well made and straight.Just wish it had knurls were the clamp is...but it is not an issue...at least not on my bike.
customer_reviews.author: jstrat121

customer_reviews.title: Great handlebars
customer_reviews.text: I got a new bike and the handlebars were low, I had to bend over while riding, which hurt by back. We bought these and installed them, now I don't have to bend over and my back feels great!
customer_reviews.author: Internet Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Really nice bars!
customer_reviews.text: These bars are no joke. They are a bit heavy but they are solid! I prefer the feel of these to my s&m slam bars. These bars would still be a good deal at double the price. Get them you'll like em. Update: Used these for 5 years now, pounding them like crazy. I am a big heavy dude and I break stuff like crazy. The bars are still good, no bends after plenty of crashes. Wish my body was as strong.
customer_reviews.author: BallZach

customer_reviews.title: they look great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bars,aesthetically pleasing, I saved 15 bucks compared to my old bars that cost 34.99.
customer_reviews.author: jurunjulo

customer_reviews.title: Bad bars.
customer_reviews.text: Bars broke as I was riding them. Almost went into oncoming traffic.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: What can I say?
customer_reviews.text: These bars have a nice solid feel to them and a nice smooth finish. I'm just an old guy making my single speed mtb. a little comfier and these bars did the trick. Also kept my bike looking sweet!
customer_reviews.author: A. L. Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Look great on my BMX bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: they are nice sturdy handlebars. I got them for bmxing because my other one got old and the threads on the handlebars got weak and so they slipped no matter how hard u tiitend them. these do not slip at all. these handle bars are sturdy and do not slip. the only complaint would be they arn't that wide like my other ones but they are fine....
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: My husband said that these fit exactly how he had hoped they would so we are very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn B.

customer_reviews.title: Very Good.....
customer_reviews.text: It is a good set of handlebars. It did not take long to ship and the bars are somewhat a good quality. Be careful on which bike you put the handlebars on because I installed them on a Redline bike and it looked like a clown bike. You will be happy with this purchase. :)
customer_reviews.author: mrcoolguy

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: They are durable diamondback handle bars, what else would you need? Diamond back is a reliable company that makes extremley durable products.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Put it on my 8yr old's 20 inch specialized bike ...
customer_reviews.text: Put it on my 8yr old's 20 inch specialized bike. objective: hold off on buying a new bike for another year or two...mission accomplished.
customer_reviews.author: Haroon O Rashid

customer_reviews.title: BMX Mountain Bike , Oh Ya!
customer_reviews.text: Good bars, they are 7/8 inch thick even tho I could not find that info on the website! I used problem solvers adapter also sold here to fit a 1 inch neck. It made the bike a giant and looks cool. No more leaning over to ride. I also used bell universal cable kit for 5.00 dollars at walmrt, and everything worked great. Now I have a BMX style mountain bike. Or just a cruiser bike made for a tall person..
customer_reviews.author: Book master

customer_reviews.title: Excellent handlebars
customer_reviews.text: These were just the right height and shapeto give my old BMX bike an updated look. The welds and paint quality are super.
customer_reviews.author: DubP

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a strong bar!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a taller handlebar that wouldn't bust my knees or my wallet. I put them on my Diamondback Reactor Pro frame. Great geometry. Very happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, great bars I love them. Their light weight and very easy to keep clean due to the glossy finish.
customer_reviews.author: chris terkovich

customer_reviews.title: BMX Handlebars
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size and perfect for what I wanted - However, After they arrived, I had to order "shims" to accommodate a 1 inch stem. Only problem I had was paint chipped off VERY easily when I was installing them and I had to repaint the area around the stem
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bars. A advertised. Good height for growing kid on a 20"er. Solid. Nice finish. Easy to install, everything switched over for me.
customer_reviews.author: childgolfer

customer_reviews.title: Diamondback BMX handlebars
customer_reviews.text: Execellent quality. Provide a super apperance on my black Schwinn Stingray OCC chopper. The crossbar is great for mounting headlamps, and bike computer.
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert Heath

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and solid feel
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and solid feel. I don't know what normal size bars are, but if these are big, then small ones must be for elves. I'm 5'10" and these seem small to me.
customer_reviews.author: Travolous

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Not even close to what I was expecting they measure the bars from the bottom to the top where grips mount not from bottom to cross bar. Very childish design and not at all what I expected from diamondback. Would have rather spent alil more money on a legitimate set of BMX bars.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to upgrade my handle bars. Well built and strong!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

product_meta.title: Diamondback BMX Trail Handlebars, Black, 27-1/4 Inch Wide
product_meta.description:
Diamondback BMX trail handlebars. Made from 4130 butted chromoly steel and heat-treated soon after bending and welding, these Diamondback BMX trail handlebars are tough and prolonged-lasting. The handlebars time-tested two-piece design and style measures 27-1/4 inches wide and 8-1/2-Inch tall, with an general weight of 1-Pound 12-Ounces.

AMAZON.COM
Made from 4130 butted chromoly steel and heat-treated after bending and welding, these Diamondback BMX trail handlebars are tough and long-lasting. The handlebars' time-tested two-piece design measures 27-1/4 inches wide and 8-1/2 inches tall, with an overall weight of 1 pound 12 ounces.
